Package jparsec.util

Provides several utilities for configuring/maintaining JPARSEC.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Configuration
    A class to configure the behavior of JPARSEC in the current JVM.
    DataBase
    A basic abstraction of a database to hold objects in memory or in disk.
    Logger
    Provides basic logging capabilities.
    Module
    A class to hold data for the release of a JPARSEC application.
    Translate
    Translates library to other languages.
    Update
    A class to automatically update JPARSEC package through Internet.
    Version
    Version of the library.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Logger.LEVEL
    The basic levels of a given log message.
    Translate.LANGUAGE
    The set of languages available in JPARSEC.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    JPARSECException
    An exception is thrown if the caller attempts to pass an invalid value, or the results of a calculation generate an invalid operation.

Package jparsec.util Description

Provides several utilities for configuring/maintaining JPARSEC.

This package contains some classes you can use to configure the default behavior of certain classes inside JPARSEC, or the translation of the library to different languages.
